title: SPLITSHARD should check disk space before performing the operation
description: SPLITSHARD should first check if it has enough space to do the split before it accepts the operation

comments.content: As a part of SOLR-12181 I added a SplitShardSuggester but it's a very simplistic implementation - in particular it does NOT check the disk space needed for splitting.
comments.author: Andrzej Bialecki
